parameters.name: BusinessType
parameters.description:
The type of the collected logs. Default value: cdn_log_access_l1. Valid values:

*   **cdn_log_access_l1**: access logs of L1 Dynamic Route for CDN (DCDN) points of presence (POPs)
*   **cdn_log_origin**: back-to-origin logs
*   **cdn_log_er**: EdgeRoutine logs

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: The list of fields. Separate multiple fields with commas (,). For more information, see [Fields in a real-time log](~~324199~~).
